      • editFile

        public void editFile(@NotNull
                     @NotNull String stringPath,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull String content)
              throws IOException
        Edit the file specified by path
        Parameters:
        stringPath - The path of the file
        content - The content that will override the file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs writing to or creating the file, or the text cannot be encoded using the specified charset

      • getFiles

        public HashMap<String,String> getFiles()
        Get all the files stored by the api and give it to the user. It gives the more recent version found on the device for all files.
        Returns:
        the HashMap with path on key and content on value

      • getFile

        public String getFile(@NotNull
                      @NotNull String stringPath)
               throws IOException
        Get a file identify by the path
        Parameters:
        stringPath - the path of the file to get content
        Returns:
        a String with the file content
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an IO exception in the file

      • deleteFile

                       @NotNull String stringPath)
                throws IOException
        Delete the file specified with the path
        Parameters:
        stringPath - path of the file that will be deleted
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an IO exception in the deleteFile sync
